title: xtwang
desc: Do you have a map? Because I just keep losing in your eyes.

title: Xiaotong Wang
desc: Meeting you was fate,and falling in love with you was out of my control.

title: Tong Tong
desc: There are two reasons why I wake up in the morning: my alarm clock and you.

title: TT
desc: If I could rearrange the alphabet,I'd put Y and I together.

title: 大宝宝
desc: There are 4 steps to happiness: 1 you 2 me 3 our hearts 4 together.

title: Nemo
desc: Love you so I don`t wanna go to sleep, for reality is better than a dream.

title: Nemo Eckel
desc: I know you like this song most and I know what you are thinking about ,too, I miss you .

title: Eckel
desc: You are everything when you are with me, and everything is you when you are not.

title: Stephanie
desc: Coffee is lonely without cups. I am lonely without you.

title: 王肖桐
desc: You know my loneliness is only kept for you, my sweet songs are only sung for you.
